title: Need Font ID please
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105905im_/http:/typophile.com/files/inventec_4797.gif)

Hey,

I need the ID of this font.  
Thanks a lot.

 [‹ font id](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105905/http:/typophile.com/node/47033 "Go to previous forum topic") [Brewery label ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105905/http:/typophile.com/node/47026 "Go to next forum topic")
author: krabbenlouie

comments.content:
I thought this may have the look of a freebie techno design, in the popular Bauhaus-ish genre. I set the word ’Inventec’ as the sample text and scanned through the Techno\>Sci-Fi and \>Various categories at Dafont and came up with a similar font called [Rezland](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705105905/http:/www.dafont.com/rezland.font?nb_ppp=50&text=Inventec) by Fraser Davidson.

It’s not exact, but maybe some tweaking can get you close enough.

- Mike Yanega
